context: Need help finding a good movie?
How are you? Yes! I like mysteries. Do you know of any?
Have you seen Murder on the Orient Express (2017) ? That's a newish one
Yes I have! Although I was a little disappointed. I thought it would be better.
Or The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo (2011), that is both action and mystery
I havent seen that but I have heard of it
I did see that one it was okay. Have you seen Clue (1985)
I have not. Seems weird. Board game movie.
It's not really. I thought it was good
entity: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo (2011)
resp: Yeah, I liked it too Gone Girl (2014)
